sentence: She most recently was a legislative policy staffer for Rep. Debbie Lesko (R-Ariz.).
title: Washington weighs Ukraine aid

sentence: GOP Reps. Frank Lucas of Oklahoma, Gary Palmer of Alabama, Kevin Brady of Texas, Patrick McHenry of North Carolina, Glenn Thompson of Pennsylvania, and Debbie Lesko of Arizona are the Republicans on the aisle.

title: State of the Union recap: Biden aims to reset presidency, addresses Russian invasion of Ukraine

sentence: (Note: Arizona Republican Rep. Debbie Lesko also voted not to support NATO.)
